We start by loading the relevant packages for this course. An R package is a collection of functions, data, and documentation that extends the capabilities of base R. Using packages is key to the successful use of R. We aregoing to make use of the so-called tidyverse. The packages in the tidyverse share a common philosophy of data and R programming, and are designed to work together naturally.
